values:
i feel like i went through a dozen break-ups in a month.
talk about being hit by a truck. 

i'm numb. can't feel a thing. i haven't cried that much, even. 

i love you. you gave up. i can't believe you did. maybe because i know you didn't.

loving thyself and being the best that i can be.
this will be my life theme from now on.

to love and be loved in return.
this will be my wish UNTIL it comes true.

to be strong for others when the situation calls for it.
this is how i shall be from now on.

i will be waiting.
hoping is never a bad thing.

someone help me.
i'm miserable. and i'm starting to get bitter.
help me. it's eating me whole. and i'm so fucking helpless. 
i don't know what to do.

hung out with the girls last night. nothing but fun! had too much to drink though. by the end of the night, i was so 'basag' already that i had to ask a friend to drive. i even made him pullover to the side (even though we're just a few meters away from the condo) so i can throw up. yes, it's that bad.

the girls slept over. i found myself waking up on the floor. haha.
---
then again.
after that temporary high.
i get back to reality.

i miss HIM. so much. now we're not even talking.
it's hard to get out of a relationship where both of you still have strong feelings for each other, when both of you still love (and are still very much IN love with) each other. it really isn't the right time, i suppose. 

i'm just scared of the waiting. i don't want to be miserable until that time comes, when we'll be together again.

i'm living my life holding on to his promises. i'm living my life in faith and in hope. that's how i get through each day right now.

i feel like someone tore my heart apart. again. 
it's breaking up. all. over. again.

exclamation. ORIGIN. Robert Chua, gayspeak c. 2000

used to express desire to sleep with some hot guy (or just about any guy, for that matter)
first heard over the radio, in a father's day advertisement

ay papiii! this one's for you!

as a chapter in the book of My Life ends, another one shall begin.
a big change deserves a big gesture.
i guess it's my way of coping and not getting left behind in the past, wallowing.
 
yes, people, i'm back in LJ-landia. woot woot!
---
tu me manques. tu me manques beaucoup.
